item.title: Severe holes in road surface, 21st July
item.description:
Riding my motorbike through traffic every morning is dangerous as the holes can destabilise a bike and cause an accident. Some work has been done on the roundabout to fix issues, but the resurfacing needs to be extended to include the dual carriageway leading from the roundabout by Danson Park down to Blendon roundabout. These holes are causing damage to vehicles and potentially can cause motorcyclists to crash.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Underpass, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet
